LASTFM.D_API_KEY: Fill in the API key you received from Last.fm
LASTFM.D_API_SECRET: Fill in the API secret, matching your key, you received from Last.fm
LASTFM.STORE_PASSWORD: Store the password in the config file
LASTFM.D_STORE_PASSWORD: From a security awareness point of view this is advised against. A authentication token will be stored, which is hashed and suffices to log into LastFM.
LASTFM.DD_STORE_PASSWORD: Don't just store your password, read the info.
LASTFM.D_SCROBBLE_THRESHOLD: Select the percentage of the song that has to be played before it will get scrobbled.
LASTFM.D_TOAST: Have volumio push a toast notification if a song gets scrobbled.
LASTFM.D_SCROBBLE_STREAM: If the stream provides song info, try to scrobble it.
LASTFM.D_STREAMSCROBBLETHRESHOLD: Fill in the amount of seconds a song in a stream (e.g. webradio) needs to have played before trying to scrobble it.
LASTFM.D_DEBUGSETTINGS: Configure the debug settings for the plugin.
LASTFM.D_ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGGING: En- or disable debug logging, this means extended logging will be available for debugging purposes.
